description:

There’s a reason people from around the world choose to come to America instead of Iran—and it’s not even close. So when Whoopi Goldberg claimed that being Black in America is no different than life in Iran, it was utterly absurd. And since her statement could not be further from the truth, she deserves to be mocked into oblivion.

Tell me you’re painfully naive without telling me you’re painfully naive — Whoopi Goldberg just did.

NEW: Whoopi Goldberg says black people living in America have it just as bad as people living in Iran.

Alyssa Farah: "I think it's very different to live in th
title: Whoopi Goldberg Claims Being Black In America Is The Same As Living In Iran. No, Really. She Said This With Her Mouth

A judge appointed by Biden blocked Trump’s ban on allowing an “X” option on passports, despite that not being what the American people voted for.

title: Another woke judge blocks a Trump EO, this one stating you can only be either a boy or a girl on your official US passport

author: Brodigan
description:

While many on the political internets have been debating if Donald Trump meant it all those times he said Iran can never get nuclear weapons, especially now that he is allowing Israel to make sure of it, we've still been debating the Big, Beautiful Bill in the Senate. We've also announced hearings into how deep the cover-up of Joe Biden's cognitive decline went. Chuck Schumer was asked about the latter, and as you can imagine, he answered stupidly by bringing up the former.

And if there is one thing I see when I look at Chuck Schumer, it's the face of a guy who knows what the American people want and like...
title: Chuck Schumer gets asked about Joe Biden's cognitive decline cover-up, responds with bizarre claim about Americans
